abstract: Many home gardeners grow indoor trees as way to bring greenery inside during winter; tips on what trees to buy and how to care for them noted.
snippet: A tree can be the centerpiece of an oasis at home to get you through the winter.
lead_paragraph: A tree can be the centerpiece of an oasis at home to get you through the winter.

headline.main: The Indoor Tree: A Tall, Green Slip of Summer
headline.seo: The Indoor Tree: A Tall, Green Slip of Summer
headline.print_headline: A Tall, Green Slip of Summer
